From our family to your table, we take pride in cultivating fresh.

From our farm to your table

Welcome to Kehler Vegetable Company At Kehler Vegetable Company, we're more than just a farm. We're a place where fresh flavors, sustainable practices, and community spirit come together. Nestled on 20 lush acres in the heart of the Comox Valley, we proudly grow a vibrant variety of vegetables, juicy berries, and gather farm-fresh eggs from our happy, pasture-raised hens.


Our mission is simple: to bring you the most nutritious, locally-grown produce while caring for the land and fostering a connection between our farm and our community.Whether you're stopping by for a handful of fresh-picked greens or a carton of eggs, you're not just a customer,you're part of the Kehler family.

Why choose Kehler Vegetables

At Kehler Vegetable Company, we believe in the power of fresh, flavorful food grown with care. Every bite of our produce bursts with nutrients, thanks to our thoughtful harvesting practices that ensure farm-fresh quality, always. Sustainability is at the heart of everything we do.


Our organic growing methods and natural soil enrichment reflect our commitment to farming in harmony with nature. Most importantly, we're more than a farm; we're part of the local community. By choosing us, you're not only nourishing your family with wholesome food but also supporting a shared vision of health, connection, and sustainability.

How Our Honour System Works

At Kehler Vegetable Company, we believe in trust and community, which is why our farmstand runs on the honour system. It's a simple yet meaningful way to connect with our customers while keeping things straightforward and convenient. Each day, we stock our farmstand with the freshest produce, berries, and eggs, harvested right from our fields.


Located at the farm gate, our farmstand is open for you to browse at your own pace. Simply select the items you'd like, tally your total, and leave your payment in the designated box. It's that easy! By shopping with us, you're not just supporting local agriculture—you're embracing a system built on mutual trust and shared values. We're proud to offer a shopping experience that fosters simplicity, honesty, and a closer connection to the land.
